metadata.title: CVE-2024-35866 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb:client: fix potential UAF in cifs_dump_full_key() Skip sessions that arebeing teared down (status == SES_EXITING) to avoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-38.38').
